you can use three backticks post preformatted text.

```log

]-----Important Information for Premium Subscribers!-----[
     *******IMPORTANT*******

* Please Read the Four Winds Folder on the Forums * To use the premium verb just type the word PREMIUM. Premium Long Term Incentives are now available under the Premium Points system. You can pick up your scrolls at the Lighthouse on the Isle of Four Winds. For more information on these benefits please look at the Premium Plus Webpage.

Convenience, customization, and character options are available in the SimuCoins Store! Check out your choices at http://store.play.net/store/purchase/GS today!

You have unread news articles. Click view to see the first new article.

              SimuCon 2017
        Simucon is nearly upon us!
        Meet your friends!  Meet the Staff!

For more info visit the following link to the forums: SimuCon Information

[Circle of Trees, Entry] The pathway to this secluded circle of trees is flanked by low burning torches set into the ground. Encroaching on either side, the edge of the jungle creates a green tunnel through which only the barest glimpse of the vegetation beyond can be seen. The ring of trees stretches to the east and west, and a bright glow beckons from the clearing in the center. Nearby, a tall teak tree with a massively thick trunk looms overhead and a trail of evenly spaced grooves leads up into its height. Obvious paths: east, west ```

test ``` You gesture at an ice troll. You hurl a roaring ball of fire at an ice troll! AS: +248 vs DS: +154 with AvD: +33 + d100 roll: +91 = +218 ... and hit for 40 points of damage! Nasty burns to left hand. Gonna need lots of butter. The ice troll is stunned! The ice troll grimaces as the flames boil her skin making her writhe in pain! ... 25 points of damage! Left hand fried to a crisp. Think barbecue sauce.

The roaring ball of fire strikes an ice troll, blossoming into a much larger sphere of flame upon impact. ... 20 points of damage! Nasty burns to right hand. Gonna need lots of butter. The ice troll howls in agony as the flames dance over her body! ... 35 points of damage! Right leg horribly scorched. Won't be usable for weeks. An ice troll falls to the ground grasping her mangled right leg!

Cast Roundtime 3 Seconds. ```

Maybe add that to some kind of format FAQ, that can be seen when you make a new post?
